detail_desc: Flared blouse in crisp cotton with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and a yoke with gathers front and back. Frills at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top with a tie detail at the neck and a seam down the front.

Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Short, A-line skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Satin inner skirt.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, straight legs.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short ribbed top in soft viscose-blend jersey with short sleeves and a cut-out front section at the top.
Sports trousers in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and ribbed hems.

Set with a waistcoat and shorts in a linen and cotton blend, a cotton poplin shirt and detachable bow tie. Lined waistcoat with two buttons at the front. Shorts with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly and button and fake pockets. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in organic cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Jacket in mesh with reversible sequins, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in satin. High waist with pleats and decorative metal buttons with sparkly stones at the top. Wrapover front and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, a deep neckline at the back with double crossover straps and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Pyjamas in patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a rounded hem and short slits in the sides. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Square neckline and short puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Lined.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined hood and long raglan sleeves. Zip at the top that continues around the edges of the hood, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in patterned satin with lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Lace trim at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastenings at the back.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front and mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide shoulder straps and a partially covered back section.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

prod_name: Baby Lock Me Up Tie Tanga
detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trims and ties at the sides with round, flat pendants at the ends.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

prod_name: Joe s/l pj in rib BB (1)
detail_desc: Pyjamas with a T shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a decorative appliqué on the knees.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned and one with a flounce over the shoulders. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Metal studs and earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 4.2 cm.
Hats in soft jersey.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair of studs and one pair of hoops with lightning-shaped pendants, both decorated with glass rhinestones.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Imitation suede bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. One inner pocket, side pockets with a concealed press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Mittens in a soft knit with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.

Straight-cut shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted, padded sections on the shoulders, down the arms and at the back. Small stand-up collar, diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges, a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short jersey skirt in a double layer at the front with an elasticated waist.

Short-sleeved playsuit in a Tencel™ lyocell weave. Notch lapels, a yoke at the back and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. One patterned pair.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Long, wide-fitting dress in crinkled jersey with a V-neck front and back and ties at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a gathered seam creating a flounce at the hem for added width and volume. Unlined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Metal eyelets and crossover lacing at the back and sides. Lined.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Bralette in soft satin with a sweetheart neckline, wide shoulder straps, smocking at the back and a zip at the front with a tab decorated with sparkly stones.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Hair elastics without metal clips.

Jumpsuit in soft viscose with a round neckline, gently gathered yoke at the front, press-studs on one shoulder and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Hairbands in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Short yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with embroidery, and a zip fly and button.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Imitation leather shopper with imitation suede inside, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. One inner compartment with an additional zipped pocket. Unlined. Size approx. 13x33x41 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Ankle-length trousers in airy viscose twill with a zip fly and button, and a regular waist with elastication at the back. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button, and gently tapered legs with creases.
Top in a soft, frill-trimmed viscose weave with a gentle V-neck and decorative lacing down the front.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with a gentle, lace-trimmed V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front, narrow ribbing around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets, and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a knit containing some wool with a jacquard-knit motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Round neckline and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short, sleeveless, A-line dress in cotton poplin with a round neckline, buttons down the back and a frill-trimmed, gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover and V-neck opening at the front. Seam under the bust and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and two elastic straps at each side.
Boxer briefs in soft microfibre with an elasticated waist. The boxers are designed with a minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
